title: maxHelper with int array instance variable fix

content.description: The following question refer to the following information.
content.question: Consider the following data field and method. Method maxHelper is intended to return the largest value among the first numVals values in an array; however, maxHelper does not work as intended. private int[] nums; // precondition: 0 < numVals <= nums.length private int maxHelper(int numVals) { Line 1: int max = maxHelper(numVals - 1); Line 2: if (max > nums[numVals - 1]) return max; else return nums[numVals - 1]; } Which of the following corrects the method maxHelper so that it works as intended?

choices.label: Insert the following statement before Line 1. if (numVals == 0) return numVals;
Insert the following statement before Line 1. if (numVals == 1 return nums[0];
Insert the following statement between Line 1 and Line 2. if (numVals == 0) return numVals;
Insert the following statement between Line 1 and Line 2. if (numVals == 1) return nums[0];

content.answer: Insert the following statement before Line 1. if (numVals == 1 return nums[0];

skill.text: 3.D: Explain why a code segment will not compile or work as intended and modify the code to correct the error.
